links.*: The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria

wikitext.*:
'''Blockdot Games''' is a company which develops minigames. The company was founded in [[2001]]. In [[2008]] it developed, together with [[Turbine]], three minigames ([[King Under the Mountain (minigame)|King Under the Mountain]], [[Swig and Toss]] and [[Eleventy-Seven Morsels]]) to promote [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria]].<ref>[http://www.lotrolife.com/unlock_the_mines_of_moria_faq/ Lotro Life, Unlock The Mines of Moria faq] (retrieved 31 March 2011)</ref>
